channel.title: Recommendation system on Magnus Petersen
channel.description: Recent content in Recommendation system on Magnus Petersen

item.title: Deep Q-Learning Recommender
item.description: Interest Recommender The aim of this project was to build a recommender system that is based on a DQN. Since I do not have access to a live webservice building an environment was a necessity. While this might not be realistic it still serves as a great exercise for me to learn the way reinforcement learning is used in recommender systems. Building an Environment: To model realistic customers, a British youth survey was selected which asked 836 British teenagers to score 31 interests from one to five.
